data.title: TOP GUN: MAVERICK
data.meta_description: A US airman trains pilots for a dangerous mission in this thrilling action sequel. The intense aviation sequences emphasise suspense and excitement over violence, and a theme of camaraderie and friendship prevails.
data.text: A US airman trains pilots for a dangerous mission in this thrilling action sequel. The intense aviation sequences emphasise suspense and excitement over violence, and a theme of camaraderie and friendship prevails.â€¦
